alert.note: Alert for Logan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 19 at 7:59PM MDT until June 22 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River at Atwood affecting Logan County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...South Platte River at Atwood. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The river is out of its banks and into fields and meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM MDT Monday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.5 feet tomorrow evening. - Action stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood stage is 11.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
